s: I had a pair of pool shoes that the sole was coming off and the manufacturer said to use this brand. Had to do two different times, but it has held up in the water and was easy to apply. ... Like all rubber cements, it’s just rubber mixed with a volatile solvent. In this case, E6000 is SBR ...
